name: web-fetch
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for fetching webpages including html/pdf/plain text type content.

tools.name: fetch-web
tools.description: Fetch URL and return content according to its content type. Returns parsed content by default or raw content if specified.

prompts.name: Fetch PDF content
prompts.description: Fetch PDF content from a URL

prompts.name: Fetch HTML content
prompts.description: Fetch HTML content from a website

prompts.name: Fetch raw content
prompts.description: Fetch raw content from a URL
prompts.text: fetch web from url: https://example.com/data.json with raw=true

prompts.name: Fetch with custom user-agent
prompts.description: Fetch content with a custom user-agent (requires server configuration)
prompts.text: fetch web from url: https://example.com using a mobile browser user-agent

user_agent.description: Custom user-agent for fetching web content
user_agent.title: user_agent
